nodes.text: Dontal was a pilot who served in the Rebel Alliance who served aboard the MC80 Home One type Star Cruiser Independence during the Galactic Civil War.

In 1 BBY, Dontal was stationed aboard the Independence and was often seen with fellow rebel pilots Misch'an and Karka. Dontal was killed in the Battle of Brigia during Operation Strike Fear, with Lieutenant Keyan Farlander noticing the pilot's absence from the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser.
